description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In Crystal Quest, you can create a warrior, a magician or archer each with their own skills. Find the crystal before time runs out. Defend it against hordes of monsters. Replay the game with a higher difficulty. Explore several different areas. Evolve different characters with upgrade stones. And more.
description.short: In Crystal Quest, you can create a warrior, a magician or archer each with their own skills. Find the crystal before time runs out. Defend it against hordes of monsters. Replay the game with a higher difficulty. Explore several different areas. Evolve different characters with upgrade stones. And more.
